extendedInfo.description: 'Fast Home Widgets' is the new generation of 'utility widgets' made to speed up your Facebook experience right on your home or lock screen! It's FREE!!!Itâs really easy to use it, just open the widgets menu, long press on the widget you want and drag it in your home screen. Login on Facebook and start to use it!!The list of the widgets:- Your home feed list: view you home feed list, comment, like, share, open URL and also write new status update. This widget will automatically update every 30 minutes. - Your friends feed list: you can view, comment, like, share, feed list of your friends' updates. This widget will automatically update every 30 minutes.  - Notifications list: you can view , comment, like, share, open URL from the list of your notifications. This widget will automatically update every 30 minutes. - Album photos slideshow: slideshow of your Facebook photo album that you select. Just tap on the widget to change the photo!  - Birthday: you can view of daily list of friendsâ birthdays in the current month.Future releases will include private messages, events, page and groups feeds!Watch the video to learn how to deploy a Widget.

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I changed a few things on my phone, and now so far every widget is working as supposed to! :) These are some good looking and useful set of widgets. Thanks!
reviews.author: Christian Mangual

reviews.title: Good start...but
reviews.comment: I love that the widgets are resizable and currently they are working, but I would like the ability to resize vertically as well as horizontally.  I use my current FB widget in a 4x3 space and currently neither of the news feed widgets will fit.  Please add the ability to resize vertically and I\'ll start using it.  Good start though!
reviews.author: Chris Clark

reviews.title: Ottima..
reviews.comment: Deve ancora migliorare, ma l\'idea \303\250 bellissima, ho sempre voluto dei widget pi\303\271 funzionali per facebook. Lo sviluppatore \303\250 una persona seria.  Due difetti per adesso: la risoluzione delle foto \303\250 veramente bassa; dovrebbe essere pi\303\271 personalizzabile, vale a dire tempo di refresh, possibilit\303\240 di selezionare tutti i propri amici invece che ad uno ad uno.
reviews.author: Rosario Emanuele Distefano

reviews.title: Ads are annoying
reviews.comment: All the widgets are great and functional but I\'m let down by its insistence on showing me ads when replying to posts via the widget, especially when I\'ve paid for fast pro. 5 stars if the ads are removed for fast pro users.
reviews.author: Danny Kilner

reviews.title: Great features
reviews.comment: Have sone great ideas for various widgets but desperatly need the following implemented soon: - ability to customize feeds layout such as font and display similar to the Fast app - Click on post to go to Fast app - No ads for Pro user
reviews.author: Ben Lam

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: But Please add the option to select all friends on the friends feed i really dont want to select 700 of my friends one by one :/
reviews.author: Rahul Debnath

reviews.title: Woo! Scrollable widget for FB!
reviews.comment: Developer needs to do a Scrollable widget for Google+, since Google don\'t seem to want to bring it back :P
reviews.author: Jon moonbeamsyndicate

reviews.title: Nice layout
reviews.comment: However the quality of the majority of the pictures displayed on the 3x4 widget is horrible only a few look decent.
reviews.author: Eliseo Bombela

reviews.title: Good , but got bug ;(
reviews.comment: \302\266 Facebook widget \' HOME\' not working . Just keep staying on loading ..      \302\266 Facebook widget \' Notification \' Doesn\'t load when i press one of the notification .     Nexus 4 Android 4.2.2 @ Paranoid Android 3.15
reviews.author: Low Zhi Heng

reviews.title: Bellissima
reviews.comment: Un vero gioellino, fa dimenticare in fretta l\'app ufficiale. Grafica ottima e molto veloce, 5 stelle strameritate
reviews.author: Nicol\303\262 Santangelo

reviews.comment: good

reviews.comment: I would like to see more clear picture, also when clicking on link to let me open in Facebook not in browser.

reviews.comment: Every widget crashes when hitting \"sign into Facebook\" using HTC One on Android 4.1.2 Sense 5

reviews.title: Good product
reviews.comment: I was using other widgets, but this one Is the best. Pease add new ones!!
